description:
Climb, rest, eat, repeat. The Four Corners Pant is engineered with stretch corduroy and plenty of front and back pockets to stash all your essentials, making it ideal for climbing.
Not a climber? Not a worry, because this 32” inseam men’s pant has a clean, slim-fit profile that makes it ideal for pretty much all outdoor activities. And with 57% organic cotton construction, you can step into nature with good conscience.
name: Prana Four Corners Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
